00020 #include "rxsensdata.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00023 
00024     RDK2_FACTORY(RXsensData);
00025     
00026     using namespace RDK2::SensorData;
00027     using namespace std;
00028     using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00029     
00030     void RXsensData::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00031     {
00032         r->startReading(getClassName());
00033             timestamp= r->read_f32();
00034             ipc_timestamp = r->read_f32();
00035             tag = r->readString();
00036             ipc_hostname = r->readString();
00037             odometryPose.x = r->read_f32();
00038             odometryPose.y = r->read_f32();
00039             odometryPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00040             estimated.x = r->read_f32();
00041             estimated.y = r->read_f32();
00042             estimated.theta = r->read_f32();
00043             accX = r->read_f32();
00044             accY = r->read_f32();
00045             accZ = r->read_f32();
00046             q.x = r->read_f32();
00047             q.y = r->read_f32();
00048             q.z = r->read_f32();
00049             q.w = r->read_f32();
00050         r->doneReading();
00051     }
00052     
00053     void RXsensData::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00054     {
00055         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00056             w->write_f32(timestamp);
00057             w->write_f32(ipc_timestamp);
00058             w->writeString(tag);
00059             w->writeString(ipc_hostname);
00060             w->write_f32(odometryPose.x);
00061             w->write_f32(odometryPose.y);
00062             w->write_f32(odometryPose.theta);
00063             w->write_f32(estimated.x);
00064             w->write_f32(estimated.y);
00065             w->write_f32(estimated.theta);
00066             w->write_f32(accX);
00067             w->write_f32(accY);
00068             w->write_f32(accZ);
00069             w->write_f32(q.x);
00070             w->write_f32(q.y);
00071             w->write_f32(q.z);
00072             w->write_f32(q.w);
00073         w->doneWriting();
00074     }
